Title: Monday
Plot: A woman is forced to relive the same day over and over as she tries to prevent Mulder and Scully from being killed by her boyfriend during a bank robbery attempt. As the events restart again and again, Mulder's sense of Deja-vu grows stronger.
GuestStars: Suanne Spoke, Monique Edwards, Wayne Alexander, David Michael Mullins, Mik Scriba, Carrie Hamilton, Darren E. Burrows
